text.__SUMMARY__: Herviera patricia is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The length of the shell attains  2 mm.
text.Distribution: This species occurs in the Indian Ocean off Réunion.
